SELECT tp.id AS trackProjectId, tp.title AS trackProjectTitle,
tpb.id AS trackProjectBoardId, tpb.title AS trackProjectBoardTitle, tpb.thumbnail AS thumbnail,
ttm.track_team_id AS trackTeamId FROM track_team_member ttm JOIN track_project_board tpb ON ttm.track_team_id = tpb.track_team_id JOIN track_project tp ON tpb.track_project_id = tp.id
WHERE ttm.user_id = #{userId} AND tp.is_deleted = FALSE AND tpb.is_deleted = FALSE
ORDER BY tpb.created_at DESC
SELECT u.name FROM track_team_member ttm JOIN user u ON ttm.user_id = u.id WHERE ttm.track_team_id = #{trackTeamId}

SELECT fpb.id AS finaleProjectBoardId, fpb.title AS title, fpb.created_at AS createdAt FROM finale_team_member ftm JOIN finale_project_board fpb ON ftm.finale_team_id = fpb.team_id WHERE ftm.user_id = #{userId} AND fpb.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY fpb.created_at DESC

SELECT s.title AS solutionTitle, s.id AS solutionId, s.runtime AS runtime, s.memory AS memory, s.language_id AS languageId, p.title AS problemTitle
FROM algorithm_problem_solution s JOIN algorithm_problem p ON s.problem_id = p.id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.is_deleted = FALSE AND p.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
